attributes.action: Sack the MPS who have made excessive expenses claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPS are blaming the speaker for their actions, they ae the ones who should be sacked not him

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
